title: Reverting back to the old client?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is easily accomplished by clicking "Launch legacy client" from the new launcher (Bottom Right).

http://puu.sh/sfwxM/224748b266.jpg
How do you make it so when you open league the old client opens
u saved my buddy ,thanks a lot
i try that and nothing happens it just closes the client

> [{quoted}](name=UnipornPRO,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=E52s9uZR,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-11-16T06:18:48.916+0000)
>
> i try that and nothing happens it just closes the client

all good i went in to the game files and opened the previous luancher

you so you can launch it directly from the updated client through a button on the bottom-right of the updated client (it says 'Launch legacy client'). Once open beta is over, the legacy client files will all be removed from your computer.
